h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Fruit of Dao Location
content: The Fruit of Dao Soak is randomly dropped from Fly-Whisk Daoist enemies within The Webbed Hollow. Simply farm these kills around the Temple of Yellow Flowers until it drops.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fruit_of_Dao.md', within the main section titled 'Fruit of Dao', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Fruit of Dao Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Fruit of Dao Soak is randomly dropped from Fly-Whisk Daoist enemies within The Webbed Hollow. Simply farm these kills around the Temple of Yellow Flowers until it drops.
